feed.title: Hyperlynx Den
feed.subtitle: Work in progress portfolio site for hyperlynx.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content: First post on this website! I’ll be honest, buying a domain was probably reckless, but it wasn’t that pricy, so I’m OK with it. I think I’ll use this place as some cross between a portfolio and a blog. Maybe a writing archive and link hub as well.
entry.summary: First post on this website! I’ll be honest, buying a domain was probably reckless, but it wasn’t that pricy, so I’m OK with it. I think I’ll use this place as some cross between a portfolio and a blog. Maybe a writing archive and link hub as well.
